item.description: Weishan He PROFILE A data enthusiast with two-year experience in quantitative marketing research, and specialties in A/B Testing, Supervised and Unsupervised Machine Learning, Data Management, and Data Visualization Skills: SQL Python (Numpy, Pandas, Statsmodels, Scikit-learn, Seaborn, Matplotlib, etc.) R Tableau (Tableau Desktop Specialist Certificate) Looker MongoDB Spark EDUCATION Master of Science, Business Analytics University of California, Davis @ USA – 2021 to 2022 Highlighted Coursework: Data Management, Advanced Statistics, Machine Learning, Big Data, Data Visualization Bachelor of Economics, International Economics and Trade Shangdong University @ China – 2014 to 2018 Highlighted Coursework: Calculus, Linear Algebra, Statistics, Econometrics, Intermediate Macro&Microeconomics
